  • Method Details

    • criterion

      AdvancementCriterion criterion()
      Gets all the AdvancementCriterion that should be achieved before this advancement is unlocked. AdvancementCriterion.empty() will be returned if no criterion was assigned.

      This AdvancementCriterion can be a AND or OR operation that contains multiple possible AdvancementCriterions.

      Returns:
      The criterion

    • parent

      Optional<ResourceKey> parent()
      Gets the parent Advancement, if present.
      Returns:
      The parent advancement, if present

    • displayInfo

      Optional<DisplayInfo> displayInfo()
      Gets the DisplayInfo of this advancement, if present.
      Returns:
      The display info, if present

    • toToastText

      List<Component> toToastText()
      Gets the Component lines that would be used to display a toast notification.
      Returns:
      The text lines
